name: extendedWriteSingleBlock(requestFlags:blockNumber:dataBlock:completionHandler:)
desc: Sends the Extended Write Single Block command (0x31 command code), as defined in the NFC Forum Type 5 tag specification, to the tag.Required.
declaration:
func extendedWriteSingleBlock(requestFlags flags: NFCISO15693RequestFlag, 
                  blockNumber: Int, 
                    dataBlock: Data, 
            completionHandler: @escaping (Error?) -> Void)
